2106190.name: Berlin Maniacs Demo
2106190.description:
In Berlin Maniacs you take on the role of the young and impressionable Tina in a fictionalized snapshot of West Berlin in the year of 1968, a time when state violence led to radicalization within the student protest movement.

You decide how Tina navigates Berlin - either with discretion or force - and ultimately affect her involvement with a group of protesters that is growing more violent by the day.
